description:
A desktop app for ComfyUI, the most powerful and modular diffusion model GUI, api and backend with a graph/nodes interface

ComfyUI Desktop is a packaged way to use ComfyUI and comes bundled with a few things:
- Stable version of ComfyUI from releases
- ComfyUI_frontend
- ComfyUI-Manager
- uv
On startup, it will install all the necessary python dependencies with uv and start the ComfyUI server. The app will automatically update with stable releases of ComfyUI, ComfyUI-Manager, and the uv executable as well as some desktop specific features.
This update brings ComfyUI core to v0.3.72
What's Changed
- Add workflow concurrency cancellation to prefer newest runs by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1437
- Limit CI triggers for .github-only changes by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1438
- Fix reusable workflow concurrency grouping by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1441
- Mask troubleshooting version text by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1440
- Update ComfyUI core to v0.3.72 by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1444
- v0.5.9 by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1445
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/compare/v0.5.8...v0.5.9
